languages.text: "Как бы то ни было — мне жаль, что когитатор не уцелел. Представь, какие тайны он мог бы раскрыть..."

traits.locale_text: "Как бы то ни было — мне жаль, что когитатор не уцелел. Представь, какие тайны он мог бы раскрыть..."

languages.text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."
languages.original_text: "Как бы то ни было — мне жаль, что когитатор не уцелел. Представь, какие тайны он мог бы раскрыть..."

traits.locale_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."
"In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."
"In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."
"In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

languages.text: “总之，那台沉思者被毁掉了，总归是件遗憾的事情。想象一下，它本可以揭示那么多秘密……”
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: “总之，那台思考器被毁掉了，总归是件遗憾的事情。想象一下，它本可以揭示那么多秘密……”

languages.text: «De todos modos, es una lástima que el cogitador no sobreviviera. Los secretos que podría haber revelado...».
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: «De todos modos, es una lástima que el cogitador no sobreviviera. Los secretos que podría haber revelado...».

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、考算機が残らなかったのは残念だ。あれがあれば、どんな秘密が明らかになっていたことか…」
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、考算機が残らなかったのは残念だ。あれがあれば、どんな秘密が明らかになっていたことか…」

languages.text: "Jedenfalls ist es schade, dass der Cogitator nicht überlebt hat. Stellt Euch vor, welche Geheimnisse er hätte offenbaren können ..."
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: "Jedenfalls ist es schade, dass der Cogitator nicht überlebt hat. Stellt Euch vor, welche Geheimnisse er hätte offenbaren können ..."

languages.text: « Dans tous les cas, je regrette que le cogitateur n'ait pas survécu. Imaginez les secrets qu'il aurait pu nous révéler... »
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: « Dans tous les cas, je regrette que le cogitateur n'ait pas survécu. Imaginez les secrets qu'il aurait pu nous révéler... »

languages.text: "Kavramsayarın sağ çıkmaması kötü oldu. Gizlediği sırlara nail olabilseydik..."
languages.original_text: "In any case, it's a pity the cogitator didn't survive. Imagine the secrets it could have revealed..."

traits.locale_text: "Kavramsayarın sağ çıkmaması kötü oldu. Gizlediği sırlara nail olabilseydik..."
